AudioContextCreateMediaStreamTrackSource.summary: The createMediaStreamTrackSource() method of the interface creates and returns a which represents an audio source whose data comes from the specified .

remarks.para: This differs from , which creates a whose audio comes from the audio track in a specified whose is first, lexicographically (alphabetically).

-Web Audio API
-Using the Web Audio API
-

AudioContextCreateMediaStreamTrackSource.returns:
A object which acts as a source for
audio data found in the specified audio track.
